name: Ultimate Kebab King
description:
I would like a kebab with: Meat, tomatoes, lettuce, onions and tzaziki. This, or similar, sentence get kebab men and women to hear often - but how can they remember each order so well? Find out and test your skills with this game and become a kebab master!

Focus on the order and then try to make the perfect kebab you want.

Crack your high score and train your brain. Brain jogging with a difference.

#indieGameDevWith<3
